<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Vampire Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3545) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 58</row>

**Archetype** [Vampire](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=181)

**Prerequisites**
You were a killed by a vampire drinking your blood.

</column>

---

You're a newly risen vampire. You gain the [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) and [vampire](/Traits.aspx?ID=242) traits and the [basic undead benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=1694), and your undead hunger is for the blood of the living. Your incisors elongate; you gain a fangs [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack that deals 1d6 piercing damage. They're in the [brawling](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=4) group and have the [grapple](/Traits.aspx?ID=184) and [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) traits. You gain revulsion and sunlight vulnerabilities detailed in the Vampire Vulnerabilities sidebar and the Drink Blood ability.

 **Drink Blood** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) **Requirements** A [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38), or willing creature is within your reach; **Effect** You sink your fangs into that creature and drink its blood. This requires an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check against the victim's Fortitude DC if the victim is grabbed, and automatically succeeds for any of the other conditions. If you succeed, the creature becomes [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), and you gain temporary HP equal to the target's level that last for 10 minutes. Further uses against the target don't increase the drained condition or grant you more temporary HP.

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the vampire archetype.

<title level="2">Vampire Dedication leads to...</title>
[Bat Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=3552), [Clinging Climber](/Feats.aspx?ID=3546), [Coffin Bound](/Feats.aspx?ID=3554), [Daywalker](/Feats.aspx?ID=3549), [Manipulative Charm](/Feats.aspx?ID=3547), [Nocturnal Kindred](/Feats.aspx?ID=3548), [Predatory Claws](/Feats.aspx?ID=3550), [Turn to Mist](/Feats.aspx?ID=3553), [Vicious Fangs](/Feats.aspx?ID=3551)
